title: Beginner English 103
headline: Polish your English skills with this free online course that teaches some basic grammar and enriches your vocabulary.
description: In this free online course, we develop vocabulary related to giving and receiving directions and provide resources that will help you improve your pronunciation. In addition to mastering vocabulary related to directions, we help you identify places around town that will help you find your way and teach you how to use the imperative to give and ask for directions. This course will suit anyone looking to improve and develop their English.
courseDescription:
This free online English course is made up of three parts: pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary. We begin with exploring words related to directions and different locations, and we show you how to pronounce these words correctly. We also explain how to identify and write addresses.

Once you have mastered these new words and have practiced your skills with the questions provided, we examine three forms of the imperative: affirmative, negative, and ‘let’s’. The imperative is mostly used when giving instructions, however, in this course, we also show you how to give and ask for directions using imperatives. We then provide you with important vocabulary related to transportation and places around town and show you how to read a map. This course teaches you general grammar rules and uses directions as an example to make these rules clear.

If you have limited knowledge of English or you are looking to refresh and review basic English skills, this course is for you! English is a powerful global language that can open doors for you, so sign up to sharpen your skills and take control of your future.
